title: IS_NITROUS_ACTIVE
content:
0x491E822B2C464FE4// IsNitrousActive
BOOL IS_NITROUS_ACTIVE(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.Returns: Returns true if nitrous is active, otherwise false.NativeDB Introduced: 3095Determines if the nitrous is currently activated in the specified vehicle.Examples:LuaJavaScriptcsharp-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in. 
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- Check if the vehicle exists in the game world.
if vehicle == 0 then return end

-- Print whether nitrous is active in the vehicle (True or False).
print(IsNitrousActive(vehicle))
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for IS_NITROUS_ACTIVE
IsNitrousActive(vehicle)
